item.title: HIHISIV - storytelling
item.description: Storytelling about HIHISIV The idea about this project appeared during my Ph.D. – when I collected and worked with transcriptome data from microarray platforms. This page is more storytelling – I will describe the processes that I conducted and organized to generate the database HIHISIV. In the end, I intend to point the difficulties and challenges faced as well as the importance of collaboration. For academic information and technical description, please, check the preprint BioRxiv and the code on Github.
